# Audisuit
## Overview
**Type**: Magic Item
#Special-Item-Type/Magic-Item

**Group**: Wondrous Items
#Special-Item-Group/Wondrous-Items

**Rarity**: Very rare
#Special-Item-Rarity/Very-rare

**Attunement**: *(requires attunement)*

## Description
Thousands of small frills and miniature tendrils flow and probe around the wearer of one of these *[[Mycelosuits|mycelosuits]]*, granting them 30-foot blindsight. These suits are made from [[Audire Boletus|funnel fungi]] caps ([[Audire Boletus|audire boletus]]).
